verbs.description: First lady Melania Trump [V: has] not been seen publicly since the early hours of May 10 , when she joined the President at Andrews Air Force Base to welcome three American detainees home from North Korea .

First lady Melania Trump has not [V: been] seen publicly since the early hours of May 10 , when she joined the President at Andrews Air Force Base to welcome three American detainees home from North Korea .
